function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"High number of infected people and deaths, overwhelming healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, testing strategies, and lockdown measures","Technologies":"Vaccine development, digital models for trend prediction, cold chain logistics for vaccine transport","People":"General population, healthcare workers, government authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Logistic challenges in vaccine distribution","Impact":"Inadequate storage facilities, difficulties in maintaining cold chain requirements","Mitigation":"Investment in cold chain infrastructure, development of transport technologies for vaccine storage","Technologies":"Ultra-cold freezers, refrigeration technology, transport containers","People":"Healthcare workers, logistics providers, government agencies","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of new variants and mutations","Impact":"Potential resistance to existing vaccines, increased transmissibility or severity","Mitigation":"Continued surveillance, development of variant-specific vaccines, research on immune response","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, vaccine research and development","People":"Vaccinated individuals, general population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
